name: Escape from Zartron Seven
description:
Your ship has run out of fuel! You were barely able to land on Zartron 7, a hostile world that nonetheless has Fuelium in abundance! Collect enough fuel to get off the planet before its inhabitants make you their lunch! Or dinner!

Move with WASD, fire in any direction by left clicking.

The world is randomly generated each playthrough! So don't bother trying to memorize where everything is!

I made this game for the Women Are Too Hard to Animate Jam, but uploaded it with my work account, not my personal account. So this is a re-post.
